author: BBC News
title: EU recalls Russia ambassador over spy row
description: Leaders agree it was "highly likely" that Russia was responsible for a nerve agent attack in Salisbury.

author: BBC News
title: EU adopts guidelines for next Brexit phase
description: EU leaders approve guidelines for trade and security talks in another step forward in the process.

author: BBC News
title: Next hit by toughest trading for 25 years
description: Profits at the retailer fall after a "challenging year" when it suffered "self-inflicted errors".

author: BBC News
title: Calculators 'make pupils better at maths'
description: Academics found calculators can also help students become better at problem solving.

author: BBC News
title: Police admit role in blacklisting workers
description: The Met Police says officers supplied intelligence to a network that barred construction staff.

author: BBC News
title: 'Mummy's not got money'
description: The parents in Oldham who struggle to buy food and basic necessities for their children

author: BBC News
title: Whales in mass stranding on Australia beach
description: About 150 animals wash up on a beach south of Perth, prompting a major rescue effort.

author: BBC News
title: China threatens US tariff retaliation
description: China asks US to pull back "from the brink" of a trade war as it announces possible tariffs on pork, wine and fruit.

author: BBC News
title: Four in 10 online GP firms 'not safe'
description: Care Quality Commission warns of inappropriate prescribing and failure to carry out checks.

author: BBC News
title: Rise in cancers 'caused by weight'
description: Excess weight now causes 6.3% of all cancer cases - up from 5.5% in 2011, a study suggests.

author: David Spiegel
title: Companies are taking action on gun control because politicians won't: CNBC survey
description: Business leaders agree that companies have a responsibility, where possible, to take action to mitigate gun violence: CNBC survey.

author: David Spiegel
title: Trump's tariff proposals, trade war will be bad for both US and China: CNBC survey
description: President Trump has said a trade war is easy to win, but top corporate brass told a CNBC survey that tariffs are a mistake and a trade war will hurt the economies of both the US and China.

author: Sam Meredith
title: Dow looks headed for a 200-point drop at the open as trade war fears intensify
description: U.S. stock index futures pointed to a sharply lower open on Friday morning, after President Trump's intensifying war on Beijing's trade practices.

author: Matt Clinch
title: Global markets slump as trade tensions escalate
description: Stock markets around the world have seen sharp falls, with investors fretting over a potential trade war.

author: David Reid
title: The first non-stop flight between Europe and Australia is ready for takeoff
description: This weekend a Boeing 787 will take off from Australia and land in London around 17 hours later.

author: Jacob Pramuk
title: Senate averts government shutdown with $1.3 trillion spending bill
description: The $1.3 trillion spending legislation now only awaits President Donald Trump's signature.

author: Nyshka Chandran
title: China strikes back at up to $60 billion in US tariffs with only with $3 billion of its own
description: Chinese President Xi Jinping's administration "is trying to be very cautious," says a former assistant U.S. Trade Representative official.

author: Jacob Pramuk
title: Trump says John Bolton will replace HR McMaster as national security advisor
description: McMaster is the second national security advisor to leave the Trump administration in just over one year.

author: Ingrid Angulo
title: Dropbox prices IPO at $21 per share
description: Dropbox priced its IPO above expectations on Thursday night.

author: Keris Lahiff
title: Billions have been wiped from the tech sector this week. Here's how to protect yourself from more pain
description: Tech stocks are at their most expensive in nearly a decade even after a brutal week in which billions were wiped from the sector. There's still some value to investing in the sector, says one trader.

author: BS Web Team
title: Sonia Gandhi falls ill in Shimla: Flies to Delhi from Chandigarh; updates
description: Senior Congress leader Sonia Gandhi fall ill in Shimla  was rushed to New Delhi. She was in SHimla with her daughter Priyanka Vadra. Sonia Gandhi complained of restlessness. Find updates on Sonia Gandhi health.

author: Express Web Desk
title: AAP MLAs’ disqualification plea: Delhi High Court asks EC to review its ‘office for profit’ order
description: AAP MLAs' disqualification plea: Striking down the Election Commission's order disqualifying 20 AAP MLAs, the Delhi High Court on Friday quashed the Presidential notification and directed the poll body to hear the case once again.

author: PTI
title: INX Media case: Karti Chidambaram granted bail by Delhi High Court
description: Karti's counsel had argued that no case under the Prevention of Corruption Act was made out against him since the Central Bureau of Investigation (CBI) had neither questioned any public servant, nor made them an accused in the matter.

title: John Bolton, Donald Trump's pick as national security advisor, is undiplomatic even by White House standards - Firstpost
description: There is more churn at the White House, with US president Donald Trump showing his National Security Advisor HR McMaster the door, and replacing him with John Bolton

author: Virat A Singh
title: Mangrove Cell clears confusion; says Olive Ridley did nest in Versova beach after eggshells discovered
description: Officials from Maharashtra’s Mangrove Cell on Friday discovered several hatched and unhatched eggshells that belonged to the Olive Ridley Turtle that laid eggs at Mumbai’s Versova beach.

author: Zee Media Bureau
title: Veteran Bollywood star alleges she was raped, businessman arrested in Mumbai
description: She had filed a complaint at the Juhu Police Station in Mumbai.

title: Weakness in market may continue but top 10 stocks can give up to 50% return
description: According to experts, the volatility is here to stay for some more time and another 4-5 per cent correction can't be ruled out.

title: UP woman tied up, thrashed on panchayat’s order; molested - Times of India
description: MEERUT: In a shocking video that has gone viral, a man is seen thrashing his 25-year-old wife mercilessly after a panchayat verdict allowed him to do .

title: ICC World Cup Qualifiers 2018 - Super Sixes Match 9 - Ireland v Afghanistan - Preview
description: The victory of United Arab Emirates over Zimbabwe has given a lifeline to both Ireland and Afghanistan with the winner in the final game of the round in Harare having all to play for as they will

author: Devina Sengupta
title: Vodafone Group and Aditya Birla Group announce leadership team
description: Balesh Sharma was named the CEO of merged entity of Idea Cellular and Vodafone India. Shama till now was the chief operating officer COO of Vodafone India.

author: Al Jazeera
title: US approves proposed $1bn arms sale to Saudi Arabia
description: US State Department approves the arms sale, despite concerns raised by rights groups that it might be used in Yemen.

author: Al Jazeera
title: Trump replaces National Security Advisor McMaster with Bolton
description: Former US ambassador to the UN, who advocated military strikes in North Korea and Iran, replaces Lt Gen HR McMaster.

author: Al Jazeera
title: Report: Western states aided Egypt's military power consolidation
description: Defence monitor report says Egypt's military has received Western security aid without 'meaningful transparency'.

author: Al Jazeera
title: UAE-backed militia deports Yemenis from southern Yemen
description: 'Northerners' have been driven from Aden city, videos and documents sent to Al Jazeera show.

title: Are Saudi Arabia and UAE buying influence in the White House?

author: Fouad Diab
title: Will Saif al-Islam Gaddafi run in Libyan elections?
description: The announcement that Saif al-Islam is planning to run for president has prompted mixed reactions within Libya.

author: Nanjala Nyabola
title: Politics in the digital age: Cambridge Analytica in Kenya
description: For CA, the Kenyan election was a revenue stream. For Kenyans, it was life or death. Shouldn't some things be sacred?

title: North Korean defector: 'If you have money, you can do anything'
description: In part four of the series on North Korean defectors, Um Yae-run sheds light on how brokers work in the country.

author: Lena Afridi
title: Trickle down elitism does not help the working class
description: The 'elites' in America need to claim responsibility for the role they played in the creation of an unjust society.

title: 'You're fired': A recap of official turnover under Trump
description: After Tillerson's dismissal on Tuesday, Al Jazeera looks at other departures under the Trump administration.

author: Fox News
title: Asia allies split on Bolton's potential impact on US-North Korea talks
description: The appointment of John Bolton as President Donald Trump’s next national security adviser has prompted mixed reactions in Asia on Friday amid his hawkish "striking first" foreign policy views.

author: Fox News
title: Time magazine leaves Second Amendment supporters off Parkland cover
description: The cover of Time magazine this week features five anti-gun survivors of the Parkland, Fla., high school massacre, but has drawn criticism for pointedly omitting their pro-Second Amendment classmates.

author: Fox News
title: NYC firefighter dies battling blaze on set of Bruce Willis, Edward Norton film 'Motherless Brooklyn'
description: One New York City firefighter has died and another has been seriously injured battling a blaze that broke out late Thursday on a film set in upper Manhattan, authorities said.

author: Fox News
title: States take on welfare reform -- with nod from Trump
description: Republicans nationwide are taking a swing at reforming welfare, with the latest initiative approved by the Missouri House last week.

author: Fox News
title: Senate passes $1.3 trillion spending bill, averting another government shutdown
description: In a vote just after midnight Friday, the Senate voted to pass a $1.3 trillion omnibus spending bill, averting a government shutdown while paving the way for the next funding fight ahead of the midterm elections.

author: Fox News
title: Disturbing footage: Video from Las Vegas shooter’s final days
description: The Las Vegas shooter’s final days were caught on surveillance tape. The chilling video shows him loading in guns, eating alone and interacting with staff.

author: Fox News
title: Neighbors of the Austin bombing suspect speak out
description: What turned the 23-year-old into a serial bomber? Longtime neighbors of Conditt family Nancy and Jeff Reeb join 'The Story' with exclusive insight from Austin, Texas.

author: Fox News
title: Stocks drop as Trump hits China with new tariffs
description: Manufacturing industry stocks see significant drops as Trump takes aim at China through tariffs; Deirdre Bolton shares details about how the markets are responding to Trump's policies.

author: Fox News
title: Daniel Henninger unsurprised by John Dowd's resignation
description: Just days after calling for the Mueller probe to end, John Dowd has resigned as President Trump's lead lawyer in special counsel inquiry; reaction from the Wall Street Journal's Daniel Henninger.

author: Fox News
title: Kurtz: Cable news didn’t make Trump president
description: 'MediaBuzz' host Howard Kurtz weighs in on argument in the New York Times that Donald Trump won the presidency because of over-exposure on cable news channels.
